## SpinnerBuilderOptions.spinner property

Spinner animation to use (default: `line`<!-- -->).

**Signature:**

```typescript
spinner?: Spinner;
```

## Remarks

Available spinners include `line`<!-- -->, `dot`<!-- -->, `miniDot`<!-- -->, `pulse`<!-- -->, `points`<!-- -->, `moon`<!-- -->, `meter`<!-- -->, and `ellipsis`<!-- -->.
